name: Flappy Twist
description:
When you dream of flying pigs and flappy rhinos you know it's already too late: you just got struck with the endless circus fever of Flappy Twist!

Flap as far as you can and avoid all the obstacles! Try to score (at least) 1 more point than your 6 year old neighbor and become part of the top 1% to achieve more than 50 points! Are you up for the challenge?

Features:
12 amazingly cute characters
9 achievements to unlock
Real-time level generator for infinite fun
GameCenter to compete with your friends
